reviewText: The young girl in the movie is more mature than her mother. Her mother tends to live a robust lifestyle while the daughter is more in tune with the world. A great movie but be warned it contains nudity and strong sexual content. I found out about the movie from seeing it listed in a book titled The Definitive Guide To Girls In Coming Of Age Movies 2015. Sold here on Amazon.

A very touching story of a single mom raising her young daughter. The young girl is disappointed with her moms' poor choices in men and shows her disapproval. Mom and daughter struggle but finally endures and become much closer.
